item.description:
THURSDAY NIGHT PARTY CRUISE
Thursday, June 18th, 2009 7:45pm

There will be live music, DJâ€™s, party favors, dancing, and more. Mark your calendars now!! For details, please read the Anthem website. Be sure to scroll down to the "Summer Party Cruise Series / June 18, 2009" box.

YOU MUST PURCHASE YOUR TICKETS BEFORE YOU RSVP YES FOR THIS EVENT.

Deadline for joining this event: June 15, 2009 @ 10PM.
If you RSVP yes by that date, but do not have a ticket, that does not count. You will be deleted from the list. (It's very difficult to organize large groups and I'm in this for fun, not to chase adults who did not read and follow the explicit instructions I took the time to provide. I hope you all understand where I'm coming from...)
item.how_to_find_us: Details will be sent in an email the week of the event
item.name: Party Cruise
